QuestData.Title: Befriending the Locals
QuestData.Description: We need allies desperately if we want a chance at surviving until tomorrow. We've made contact with one of the outcast arakkoa, but he refused to discuss alliances without speaking to you first.$B$BHe called himself Dusk-Seer Irrizar. You should speak with him, commander.$B$BYou can find him just southwest of Veil Terokk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Dusk-Seer Irizzar near Veil Terokk.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, so you are the one your people spoke of so highly. We may discuss an alliance, but first...
